tool_description:
Indeed Jobs API - Sweden
Get the Jobs List as JSON by giving Keyword, Location (Sweden Only) and offset value.
Contact me at: vuesdata@gmail.com or visit https://www.vuesdata.com for building custom spiders or custom requests.
title: Indeed Jobs API - Sweden

api_list.name: SearchJobs
api_list.description:
offset = 0 (starting of the page, it must be increased by 10 to achieve pagination)
keyword = python (it can be any search keyword for ex: job title or skill title)
location = Stockholm (For now this API gets data for Sweden Indeed. You can enter a specific city or state.)
This will provide you with a list of 15 jobs in the page, by default a single page can have a max of 15 jobs posting only. In order to get all the data using pagination you need to keep increasing the count of offset by 10.

You will get the following fields using this API.

'position'
'company_name'
'job_title'
'job_location'
'salary'
'date'
'job_url'
'urgently_hiring'
'multiple_hiring'
'company_rating'
'company_reviews'
'company_review_link'
'company_logo_url'
'page_number'

utterances.utterance: Find Python developer jobs in Stockholm starting from the first page.
Search for data scientist positions in Gothenburg, starting from the second page.
Get a list of software engineer jobs in Malmö, starting from the third page.
Find marketing manager positions in Uppsala, starting from the first page.
Search for graphic designer jobs in Västerås, starting from the fourth page.
Get a list of project manager positions in Linköping, starting from the second page.
Find web developer jobs in Örebro, starting from the first page.
Search for accountant positions in Helsingborg, starting from the third page.
Get a list of nurse jobs in Jönköping, starting from the first page.
Find teacher positions in Norrköping, starting from the second page.
